tag_list: justin-barrett-heroic, heroic-minnesota, heroic-minneapolis, heroic-justin-barrett, heroic-justin, heroic-twin-cities
overview:
Justin Barrett is an entrepreneur, marketer, innovator and Co-Founder and CEO of Heroic.

Justin is previously the Co-Founder of Holy Cow, where he pioneered the concept of organic cotton apparel with retail partners including Nordstrom, Whole Foods, Von Maur and numerous international retailers.

Prior to Holy Cow, Justin worked with Fallon Minneapolis and London in Connection Planning.

Barrett received his Bachelor of Science degree in Marketing from the Carlson School of Management at the University of Minnesota.
